ApplicationPackage.Name: Auto Join Ez
ApplicationPackage.Description: The Auto Join Ez is a simple Join/Unjoin plugin. This app can help to join geometry between Walls, Floors, Columns, etc
ApplicationPackage.Author: Manh Nguyen Duc
